question: Which among the following universities of Uttar Pradesh ranked first in the state of UP in the list of QS India University Rankings 2020?
option3: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University
explanation: Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur ranked first in the state of UP in the list of QS India University Rankings 2020. All India ranking of IIT Kanpur is 6th. IIT Bombay ranked first in the list.
